name: Maui Marketing Scripts, Tags & CSS Manager
author: Maui Marketing

sections.description:
Place scripts in the right place within your page or post. Add script or css directly into the header, right after the opening body tag or in the footer of your WordPress website. No matter what theme you have running. Features include load control features so you can manage the page or page types that particular script, tag or css appears on. Create as many unique placement and script combinations as needed. Get maximum control over the execution of scripts, tags and css on each page of your site.

Features

  • Super easy to use.
  • Add unlimited number of scripts and styles.
  • Manage which scripts load by default on custom post types or load on specific posts.
  • Easily Include or Exclude option the script on selected post types.

Technical support

Dear users: Our plugins are available for free download. If you have any questions or recommendations regarding the functionality of our plugins (existing or new options, current issues), please feel free to contact us at http://support.mauimarketing.com/Maui Marketing. Please note that we accept requests in English only. All messages in other languages won’t be accepted.
sections.installation:
1. Install as a regular WordPress plugin or by uploading the file to your web server (in the /wp-content/plugins/maui-marketing-script-manager).
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  • Placement
  • Auto find and add code to header and footer.

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: This plugin allows you to add custom scripts, css and tags to header, footer and body.
